title: Rick -File X258375
creator_credit: University of California, Los Angeles and National Institute of Mental Health (U.S.)
brief_description: Demonstrates how the probation service responds to a youthful narcotics offender who - unbeknownst to the people coming into contact with him - is a probation employee himself. This film shows Rick assuming the role of ‘offender” and going through the same interview process as actual offender would go through.
